mapper.select: select case when count(*) > 0 then 1 else 0 end from rayson_film where name = #{name}

SELECT a.id AS aId, a.code AS aCode, a.name AS aName, a.price AS aPrice, b.branch_code AS branchCode, b.branch_Name AS branchName, c.id AS cId, c.discount_type AS discountType, c.discount AS discountPct, c.card_type AS cardType, CASE WHEN c.discount_type = '0' THEN round(c.discount * 0.01 * a.price, 0) WHEN c.discount_type = '1' THEN c.fix_price END orderPrice, CASE WHEN b.status IS NULL THEN '-1' ELSE b.status END status FROM c LEFT JOIN a ON c.route_id = a.id LEFT JOIN b ON b.branch_code = a.branch_code LEFT JOIN (SELECT id, status FROM d WHERE status = '0' GROUP BY id) AS e ON e.id = c.id WHERE 1 = 1
